thread.title: HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 50 Range Forest Officer Posts
thread.title_full: HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 50 Range Forest Officer Posts

author: publisher12
title: HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 50 Range Forest Officer Posts
text: HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 50 Range Forest Officer Posts HPPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 50 Range Forest Officer Posts: Himachal Pradesh Public Service Commission (HPPSC) has issued a notification for the recruitment of 50 Range Forest Officer vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates can apply Online on or before 11-04-2017 till 11.59 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below… HPPSC Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: Range Forest Officer 1. Gen: 29 Posts 5. Genl.-Ex. SM: 05 Posts 6. SC-Ex. SM: 01 Post 7. ST-Ex. SM: 01 Post 8. OBC-Ex. SM: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 21-31 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelor’s Degree (or equivalent) in Science or Engineering from any recognized University with concerned subjects. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Examination/ Interview/ Test. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 400/- for General category & Rs. 100/- for SC/ ST/ OBC candidates of HP through ‘e-Challan’ at any branch of Punjab National Bank or through ‘e-Payment’ option by using Debit or Credit Card of any Bank. No fee for Ex-Servicemen/ visually impaired candidates of H.P. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.hppsc.hp.gov.in on or before 11-04-2017 till 11.59 PM. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying Online, Applicants should scan their photograph & signature. 2. Log in through the website www.hppsc.hp.gov.in. 3. Click on “Apply Online —> ”New User Sign up here”. 4. Fill all the details & Click on ”Create User”. 5. Select the desired post & click on ”Click to Apply”. 6. Fill all the details in the application form & then Submit OK. 7. Take printout of online application for future use. Last Date for Submission of Application: 11-04-2017 till 11.59 PM. For more details like vacancy details, essential qualification, pay band, physical standard & other information click on the link given below….
